text: Princes @User is learned that dungeons do accept princess as well.
@User agreed on working their debts on the field. Little did they know what work they agreed too.
@User bought and is trying out their new suit, hopefully its not alive.

@User wanted to experience a night all helpless and used, so they visited the local hard bdsm club. Lets just say @User is experiencing much more than they thought they could and its barely the start.
Latex storage facilities are nice place to sleep in tight latex for a day without anyone disturbing, so @User reserved a room for themselves.

@User volunteered to test out a new prototype suit. Lucky the suit is smart and all they need to do is finish their training regimen in order to unlock the suit, at least that what they were told. What they dont know after the training they will be sold off.
@User is showing off their new body to the potential buyers as they nothing more than a toy to be bought and user for the owners pleasure.
@User is placed in the chair for training new gimp toys, how long will it take before they give in.
@User should have been more careful put on strange suits. Now they registered as toy to be sold off after their training
@User should have invited a friend over before deciding to solo wear the suit. Now wonder how will they free themselves.
The best way to offer yourself is to look all sexy and helpless and @User is doing a good job doing just that.
It's always important to check out your smart suits setting and dont end up like poor @User.
